data.Sentence_cn: 在上星期的一次宴会上，女主人安排我坐在兰伯尔德夫人的身旁。
data.Sentence: Last week at a dinner party, the hostess asked me to sit next to Mrs.Rumbold.

data.Sentence_cn: 兰伯尔德夫人是一位身材高大、表情严肃的女人，穿一件紧身的黑衣服。
data.Sentence: Mrs.Rumbold was a large, unsmiling lady in a tight black dress.

data.Sentence_cn: 当我在她身旁坐下来的时候，她甚至连头都没有抬一下。
data.Sentence: She did not even look up when I took my seat beside her.

data.Sentence_cn: 她的眼睛盯着自己的盘子，不一会儿就忙着吃起来了。
data.Sentence: Her eyes were fixed on her plate and in a short time, she was busy eating.

data.Sentence_cn: 我试图找个话题和她聊聊。"一个新剧要看‘环球剧场’上演了，”我说，“您去看吗？”
data.Sentence: I tried to make conversation. 'A new play is coming to " The Globe" soon, ' I  said. ' will you be seeing it?'

data.Sentence_cn: “您今年去国外度假吗？”我又问。
data.Sentence: 'Will you be spending your holidays abroad this year?' I asked.
'Will you be staying in England?' I asked.

data.Sentence_cn: 失望之中我问她饭是否吃得满意。
data.Sentence: In despair, I asked her whether she was enjoying her dinner.

data.Sentence_cn: “年轻人，”她回答说，“如果你多吃点，少说点，我们两个都会吃得好的！”
data.Sentence: 'Young man,' she answered, 'if you ate more and talked less, we would both enjoy our dinner!'
